description: Transport Canada (ASD) has a requirement on an as and when requested basis issued through task authorizations for component repair and overhaul services and Advance Exchange for the following:An unserviceable Brake Assembly, removed from a CL600-2B16 (Challenger 604)604-85123-101 [VPN 5012333]. Component received must be in compliance with Vendor Bulletin VB5012333-32-02 INTRODUCTION OF NEW HEAT STACK WITH TUNGSTEN-CARBIDE COATED ROTOR CHANNELS.
duration_in_months: during the contract award to March 31st, 2024 (with two option periods of January 15, 2025 January 15th, 2027)
